main event: A silvery-colored object approximately 25 feet long was observed in the sky over Little Rock, Arkansas on November 5, 1962.
interesting points: The object had a vapor trail about 1/2 mile long., The observation lasted for 2 hours., The object disappeared at the sighting of the sun., The object was tracked on radar., This observation was part of Operation Firefly.
sighted object: a single silvery-colored object with a vapor trail
witness description: a civilian man and his wife, noted as a painter and housewife respectively
